oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic seed propagation: current status and problems in Europe
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Gaile, Zinta
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Breeding, genetics and propagation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Report is part of Deliverable 4 of 6th FP SSA project “Environmental friendly food production system: requirements for plant breeding and seed production” (ENVIRFOOD) and contains information about current status and problems in EU regarding to organic seed propagation.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Gaile, Zinta (2005) Organic seed propagation: current status and problems in Europe. State Stende Plant Breeding station.
